au_564349: ping -c1 ipadress

#!/bin/bash

# machine 1
ping -c1 ipadress &> /dev/null && echo "machine 1 is up" || echo "machine 1 is down"

# machine 2
ping -c1 ipadress &> /dev/null && echo "machine 2 is up" || echo "machine 2 is down"
# ..

Explanations about Options.-i:
Wait interval seconds between sending each packet. The default is to wait for one
 second between each packet normally, or not to wait in flood mode. Only super-user may
 set interval to values less than 0.2 seconds.
